ttp_template:
<group name="interface_link_local_address_mtu">
  MTU is {{MTU | ORPHRASE}} bytes
{{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}} [down/down]
  IPv6 is enabled, link-local address is {{LINK_LOCAL_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}} [down]
</group>
cli_content:
Ethernet1/1 [up/up]
  IPv6 is enabled, link-local address is FE80::2E0:54FF:FE90:BE8D [up]
  Global unicast addresses:
    2001:DB8::1, subnet is 2001:DB8::/64
  Joined group addresses:
    FF02::1:FF00:1
    FF02::1
  MTU is 1500 bytes
  ICMP redirects are enabled
  ICMP unreachables are always sent
Ethernet1/2 [down/down]
  IPv6 is enabled, link-local address is FE80::2E0:54FF:FE90:BE8E [down]
  Global unicast addresses:
    2001:DB8::2, subnet is 2001:DB8::/64
  Joined group addresses:
    FF02::1:FF00:2
    FF02::1
  MTU is 1500 bytes
  ICMP redirects are enabled
  ICMP unreachables are always sent
textfsm_template:
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value LINK_STATUS (\S+)
Value LINE_PROTOCOL (\S+)
Value LINK_LOCAL_ADDRESS (\S+)
Value GLOBAL_UNICAST_ADDRESS (\S+)
Value MTU (\d+)

Start
  ^\s*${INTERFACE}\s*\[\s*(\w+)/(\w+)\s*\]$$
  ^\s*IPv6 is enabled, link-local address is\s*${LINK_LOCAL_ADDRESS}\s*\[(\w+)\]$$
  ^\s*Global unicast addresses:$$
  ^\s*${GLOBAL_UNICAST_ADDRESS}\s*,\s*subnet\s*is\s*[\w:]+$$
  ^\s*MTU is\s*${MTU}\s*bytes$$
